trans-unit.source:
\n

This class provides helpers that the Visual Basic compiler uses for late binding calls; it is not meant to be called directly from your code.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx Xxxxxx Xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xx xx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Executes a late-bound method or function call.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx x xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This helper method is not meant to be called directly from your code.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An instance of the call object exposing the property or method.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The type of the call object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the property or method on the call object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array containing the arguments to be passed to the property or method being called.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array of argument names.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array of argument types; used only for generic calls to pass argument types.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array of Boolean values that the late binder uses to communicate back to the call site which arguments match ByRef parameters.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx $xxxxxx$XxXxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Each True value indicates that the arguments matched and should be copied out after the call to LateCall is complete.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx $xxxxxx$Xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xx $xxxxxx$XxxxXxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A Boolean value indicating whether or not the return value can be ignored.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An instance of the call object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Executes a late-bound property get or field access call.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx x xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This helper method is not meant to be called directly from your code.

\n

trans-unit.source:

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Executes a late-bound property set or field write call.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx x xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This helper method is not meant to be called directly from your code.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An instance of the call object exposing the property or method.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array containing the arguments to be passed to the property or method being called.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array of argument names.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A Boolean value used to determine whether the set operation will work.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Set to True when you believe that an intermediate value has been set in the property or field; otherwise False.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xx $xxxxxx$Xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A Boolean value that specifies when the base reference of the late reference is an RValue.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx $xxxxxx$XXxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source: Set to True when the base reference of the late reference is an RValue; this allows you to generate a run-time exception for late assignments to fields of RValues of value types.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xx $xxxxxx$Xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx $xxxxxx$XXxxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxxx xxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxx x xxx$xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx $xxxxxx$XXxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Otherwise, set to False.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xx $xxxxxx$Xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Executes a late-bound property set or field write call.
